basic.description: This course is appropriate for any student interested in environmental issues and is particularly appropriate for students in the Queen's Environmental Studies Program.  The course examines financial issues related to the environment in the context of natural capitalism and corporate social responsibility.  The course provides an overview of concepts and tools related to 1) financial reporting, 2) assessing and managing environmental costs and benefits, 3) environmental entrepreneurship.
basic.subject: COMM
basic.title: Environmental Accounting
